name: refnum
description: The primary key for this record

name: dataStartTZ
description: Generated helper column to hold the time zone ID for 'dataStart'.

name: dataEndTZ
description: Generated helper column to hold the time zone ID for 'dataEnd'.

name: startTZ
description: Generated helper column to hold the time zone ID for 'start'.

name: endTZ
description: Generated helper column to hold the time zone ID for 'end'.

name: recordsCount
description: count of database or file or ... records.

name: status
description: Status flag, i.e., success=true and failure-false

name: created
description: The timestamp for when the record was created. (TILDA.JobPart)

name: lastUpdated
description: The timestamp for when the record was last updated. (TILDA.JobPart)

name: deleted
description: The timestamp for when the record was deleted. (TILDA.JobPart)
